art.author: diana
art.post: I was in 5th grade.    There were pylons in a huge circle that we had to run around.    You had to run around several times and someone was going to be a winner.    No way could I keep up but I was trying so hard.    I said to myself, ‘O Dear God, help me.”   Immediately I began to run like the wind.   I did not win, but I did!!
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
